A service is defined by a set if in-memory structures. These structures are hierarchical and can define a service containing any number of functions, which themselves accept any number of arguments. The definition of an argument

Field Documentation

BPString BPArgumentDefinition::docString

A human readable english documentation string

BPString BPArgumentDefinition::name

The name of the agument, all arguments in BrowserPlus are named

BPBool BPArgumentDefinition::required

whether the argument is required or not

BPType BPArgumentDefinition::type

The expected type of the argument
